venue_description: World Equestrian Center – Ocala is the largest equestrian complex in the United States, featuring world‑class indoor and outdoor arenas and state‑of‑the‑art amenitieshttps://fun4ocalakids.com/Fun-Around-Town/Sport-Courts-Fields-and-Complexes/World-Equestrian-Center/View-details.html#:~:text=The%20World%20Equestrian%20Center%20%E2%80%93,the%20equine%20industry%20and%20more. The complex welcomes competitors and spectators year‑round and is designed for top equestrian sport and entertainment.

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for World Equestrian Center Ocala (venue_uid=wcoc-venue)","Location":"city: Ocala city_uid=ocala, state:FL state_uid=fl.","GEO context":"lat=29.2056571, lon=-82.25154649999999 placeid=EioxNzUwIE5XIDgwdGggQXZlICMyYywgT2NhbGEsIEZMIDM0NDgyLCBVU0EiORo3CjESLwoUChIJq4kBtmSA6IgROTX8jbdauTYQ1g0qFAoSCY2151FhgOiIERRZVtmDixonEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://worldequestriancenter.com/ocala-fl/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

data-dine-am:
{
  "venue_uid": "wcoc-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "name": "Ralph’s Burger & Sandwich Shop",
      "approx_drive": "2 min / 0.5 mi (on-site)",

      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "located inside WEC; extremely convenient for exhibitors",
      "source_link": "https://worldequestriancenter.com/ocala-fl/dining/"
    },
    {

      "approx_drive": "2 min / 0.5 mi (on-site)",

      "cuisine": "Bakery, Cafe, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "07:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["croissants", "bagels", "muffins", "latte", "yogurt parfait"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "French-inspired bakery inside WEC; great for grab-and-go",
      "source_link": "https://worldequestriancenter.com/ocala-fl/dining/"
    },
    {
      "name": "Filo’s Mexican Cantina",

      "opens_at": "07:00",

      "safety_notes": "on WEC property; fast service, easy for riders between classes",

    {
      "name": "Starbucks – WEC Ocala",

prompt-link:
TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"World Equestrian Center Ocala","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://worldequestriancenter.com/ocala-fl/","city_uid":["rec4pE2d0qPNvDJhU"],"placeId":"EioxNzUwIE5XIDgwdGggQXZlICMyYywgT2NhbGEsIEZMIDM0NDgyLCBVU0EiORo3CjESLwoUChIJq4kBtmSA6IgROTX8jbdauTYQ1g0qFAoSCY2151FhgOiIERRZVtmDixonEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"1750 NW 80th Ave, Ocala, FL 34482","venue_recordId":"recvkIDBJ6qXtwBs6"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"World Equestrian Center Ocala","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://worldequestriancenter.com/ocala-fl/","city_uid":["rec4pE2d0qPNvDJhU"],"placeId":"EioxNzUwIE5XIDgwdGggQXZlICMyYywgT2NhbGEsIEZMIDM0NDgyLCBVU0EiORo3CjESLwoUChIJq4kBtmSA6IgROTX8jbdauTYQ1g0qFAoSCY2151FhgOiIERRZVtmDixonEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"1750 NW 80th Ave, Ocala, FL 34482","venue_recordId":"recvkIDBJ6qXtwBs6"}]), World Equestrian Center Ocala represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 1750 NW 80th Ave, Ocala, FL 34482, GEO context: lat=29.2056571, lon=-82.25154649999999 placeid=EioxNzUwIE5XIDgwdGggQXZlICMyYywgT2NhbGEsIEZMIDM0NDgyLCBVU0EiORo3CjESLwoUChIJq4kBtmSA6IgROTX8jbdauTYQ1g0qFAoSCY2151FhgOiIERRZVtmDixonEgIyYw., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
